item.title: New York:3-Day Niagara Falls US,Washington DC Tour w/3rd&4th Free
item.description: Discover the East Coast beyond New York with this 3-day, multi-stop tour. Travel to Washington D.C. via Philadelphia to explore the nation's capital. Continue on to visit Corning and the US side of Niagara Falls, with the option to ride the iconic Maid of the Mist, visit Cave of the Winds, and more (all activities at an additional cost).

image.alt: New York:3-Day Niagara Falls US,Washington DC Tour w/3rd&4th Free

item.title: Niagara Falls USA 2-Day Tour from New York City with 3rd&4th Free
item.description: Discover Niagara Falls, and other regional highlight, on this 2-day tour from New York City. Stop at the Corning Museum of Glass and Watkins Glen State Park (optional tours, with extra expense), head to Niagara for a night tour with fireworks show. The next morning, discover the best of the region, including a Maid of the Mist trip (separate expense) in season, before returning to New York.

image.alt: Niagara Falls USA 2-Day Tour from New York City with 3rd&4th Free

item.title: 5-day Niagara Falls, Toronto, Ottawa, Montreal & Quebec City Tour
item.description: Visit four spectacular cities in Eastern Canada—Toronto, Ottawa, Montreal, and Quebec—on this 5-day excursion from New York City. On the first day, experience Niagara Falls illuminated at night. Then, travel to Toronto, where you’ll head to the top of the Skylon Tower to see the falls. Enjoy authentic French food in Quebec (at your own expense), marvel at the Notre Dame Basilica in Montreal, and visit the Ausable Chasm in upstate New York. Groups of more than four guests or those that desire separate rooms should complete separate bookings. If you have more than one booking, be sure to provide the confirmation numbers in order to travel together.

image.alt: 5-day Niagara Falls, Toronto, Ottawa, Montreal & Quebec City Tour

item.title: Washington D.C.& Philadelphia 2-Day Tour from New York City
item.description: Visit Philadelphia and Washington D.C. and see numerous important landmarks with this overnight tour from New York City. Visit the Independence National Historical Park in Philadelphia. In Washington D.C., visit the exterior of the Capitol, Supreme Court, and the White House, various memorials, and enjoy a nighttime bus tour around the city.

image.alt: Washington D.C.& Philadelphia 2-Day Tour from New York City

item.title: Private Walking Tour of Hoboken, Only Half a Mile from Manhattan!
item.description:
Join me on a private walking tour of Hoboken, a charming waterfront city only half-a-mile (0,8km) west of Manhattan, across the Hudson River. Look it up on Google Maps!
Hoboken is an oft-overlooked gem whose skyline views, riverfront parks, industrial past, immigrant influences, brownstones, cafes, shops and food offer a unique look at local life and history.
Accessible from Manhattan via ferry (5-10 mins), train (10-15 mins) or Uber/Lyft. Choose MEET IN HOBOKEN or MEET IN MANHATTAN when booking. Contact us to determine the best option for your group.
Step away from New York City's tourist crowds — feel like you're visiting a friend — leave with a better understanding of local life!
*Scroll down for full itinerary (under ITINERARY or WHAT TO EXPECT). Certain mobile apps do not show these details, so you may need to view on the web.*
Operated by Viamo Tours, LLC
Hosted by Greg Guglielmo
I've been giving tours for years and began publishing online in 2023
Parlo un po' d'italiano

image.alt: Private Walking Tour of Hoboken, Only Half a Mile from Manhattan!

item.title: Niagara Falls, Toronto and Thousand Islands 3-Day Tour from NYC
item.description: Escape the concrete jungle. This 3-day, 2-night tour from NYC takes you upstate and beyond. Explore the natural beauty of Watkins Glen State Park; experience the power of the mighty Niagara Falls; and discover the cosmopolitan culture of Toronto and see landmarks including the CN Tower (admission fees incur additional costs). Includes two nights' accommodation.

image.alt: Niagara Falls, Toronto and Thousand Islands 3-Day Tour from NYC

item.title: 2-Days Niagara Falls USA, Watkins Glen and Scenic Hotel Tour
item.description: Niagara Falls has been drawing tourists for over two centuries, but with sights spread out through the area, navigating the New York side of the falls can present a challenge for independent travelers. Skip the stress of planning during this attraction-packed, semi-independent two-day excursion, which includes an optional nighttime Cave of the Winds tour and a visit to Watkins Glen State Park.

image.alt: 2-Days Niagara Falls USA, Watkins Glen and Scenic Hotel Tour

item.title: New York Skyline Magic - Private Tour With a Local
item.description: Enjoy New York's number one attraction in style, in a private tour with a friendly local who will take you to wonderful hidden corners with the best skyline views, at an affordable price. The panoramic views of Manhattan's skyline are legendary. They should be at the top of the to-do lists of any visitor. The genius of man and the wonders of nature working together to create a unique spectacle. We will appreciate the views from across the imposing Hudson River, facing Manhattan West Side, which offers by far the best skyline sights. During a three-hour tour, we will explore a magnificent 19-mile waterfront and get a taste of the charming neighborhoods on the Hudson's banks, including Hoboken and Jersey City. The tour can be customized to include attractions such as the wonderful Liberty Park, with views of the Statue of Liberty from a short distance, and the Empty Sky 9/11 Memorial. No other tour offers such a comprehensive exploration of the skyline.

image.alt: New York Skyline Magic - Private Tour With a Local

item.title: Private Sail Around New York City and The Statue of Liberty
item.description: Discover NYC from a completely different perspective on a private sailboat charter. You and your group will view New York City in ways that are breath taking. See the Statue of Liberty up close like you can almost touch it. Sit back and relax or take a more active approach in sailing the boat. We just want you to have an experience that you will remember!!

image.alt: Private Sail Around New York City and The Statue of Liberty

item.title: 3-Day Niagara Falls, Corning & Thousand Island Tour from New York
item.description: Combine several top sites in Upstate New York on this 3-day sightseeing tour from New York City, with two nights’ accommodation included. See and do only what you want: most entrance tickets to different attractions and experiences are optional and can be purchased from your guide. You’ll get the chance to visit the Corning Museum of Glass, ride a boat at Niagara Falls, cruise Lake Ontario’s Thousand Islands, and more.

image.alt: 3-Day Niagara Falls, Corning & Thousand Island Tour from New York

item.title: Half Day New York City Private Tour
item.description:
Explore the Best of New York City: Your Ultimate Private Tour Experience! Welcome to the city that never sleeps, the iconic New York City! Are you ready to embark on an unforgettable journey through the Big Apple's most iconic landmarks? Look no further! We are thrilled to offer you an exclusive opportunity to discover the vibrant heart of New York City through our private tour tailored for small groups and families. Sit back, relax, and allow us to take you on an extraordinary adventure through the bustling streets of this magnificent metropolis!
With our private tour, you won't have to worry about crowded buses or fixed schedules. Instead, enjoy the freedom of a tailored itinerary that suits your preferences and pace. We will pick you up directly from your chosen address, ensuring a hassle-free and comfortable journey.

image.alt: Half Day New York City Private Tour

item.title: New York 4-Day Tour to Niagara Falls & Washington,3rd&4th Free
item.description: Welcome to join our 4 days trip by travel with thoroughly disinfected sightseeing coach and our professional well-trained tour escort. We will be visit and pack an array of top landmarks and attractions on the east coast, learning more about local culture and history. Experience the Wonder of Nature, taking an in-depth visit to Niagara Falls, getting astonished by the power of nature and spectacular view! Visit the World Top Universities and walk into the world top ranked universitiy-- Havard University. You will have the Foodie’s Choice such as grab a bite of authentic local taste, check out the fresh products at Quincy Market and enjoy a real Boston lobster meal.

image.alt: New York 4-Day Tour to Niagara Falls & Washington,3rd&4th Free

item.title: New York City + Niagara Falls 2-Day Tour
item.description: See some of the most powerful waterfalls in the world without dealing with how to get there or where to sleep. This two-day tour to Niagara Falls from New York City also includes other area attractions like Corning Museum of Glass and Watkins Glen State Park, famous for its dramatic gorge. Experience the falls at night and again the following day with Maid of the Mist boat ride, Cave of the Winds, and Whirlpool State Park.

image.alt: New York City + Niagara Falls 2-Day Tour

item.title: NYC Skyline Dinner Cruise from New Jersey
item.description:
Set out on a dinner cruise with the Manhattan skyline as the backdrop during this evening tour, departing from Weehawken, New Jersey. Climb aboard a boat for a scenic tour that includes views of the Statue of Liberty, Brooklyn Bridge, Ellis Island, and the Empire State Building.
Enjoy the chef prepared dinner buffet with freshly prepared entrees, salads and desserts along with live musical entertainment provided by the onboard DJ. Creative cocktails, wine and beer available from the well-stocked cash bar.

image.alt: NYC Skyline Dinner Cruise from New Jersey

item.title: Self-Guided Scavenger Hunt: Hoboken Harbor & History!
item.description: Discover the top landmarks and hidden gems of Hoboken on this fun and interactive scavenger hunt. Download the app, gather your team, and head out to find clues, answer trivia questions, and complete challenges, while learning about the history and culture of the city. You’ll work as a team but compete against each other to see who will be the winner.

image.alt: Self-Guided Scavenger Hunt: Hoboken Harbor & History!

item.title: 3-Day Niagara Falls,NY and Boston Tour from New York
item.description: Take a trip to Niagara Falls for an unforgettable trip! Visit the Corning Glass Center and watch the exquisite glass craftsmanship. Explore the power of nature and take an in-depth tour to Niagara Falls! Walk into the world top ranked universitiy-- Havard University. Grab a bite of authentic local taste, check out the fresh products at Quincy Market and enjoy a real Boston lobster meal. You will be simply amazed by the beauty of the falls and what makes Niagara Falls worth the visit. We will embark on our first journey to experience the rich historical flavor of Boston.

image.alt: 3-Day Niagara Falls,NY and Boston Tour from New York

item.title: Niagara Falls,Toronto,Montreal 5-Day Maple Foliage Tour from NY
item.description: Autumn in Canada offers a stunning array of colors as the leaves turn orange and red. Tour through four famous cities in eastern Canada–Toronto, Ottawa, Montreal, and Quebec–over the course of five days and see the area’s natural beauty. Leave the planning to experts and maximize your time and sightseeing at each city with this tour.

image.alt: Niagara Falls,Toronto,Montreal 5-Day Maple Foliage Tour from NY

item.title: New York Washington DC Three-Day Tour of Niagara Falls
item.description: Embark on a journey to two popular American destinations: Niagara Falls and Washington DC. Immerse yourself in the natural beauty of Niagara Falls and get close to the falls on an exciting boat ride. At Washington DC, see the White House, Lincoln Memorial, and more as you learn about America’s history. Relax as you travel roundtrip from New York without needing to drive or navigate.

image.alt: New York Washington DC Three-Day Tour of Niagara Falls

item.title: Lake Placid, Whiteface Mountain 2-Day Tour from New York
item.description: See several natural wonders–Whiteface Mountain, High Falls Gorge, Ausable Chasm, and Lake Placid–on one convenient tour from New York City. Enjoy a break from the bustling city without the hassle of planning transportation and accommodations. Leave the driving and navigation to your guide while you immerse yourself in nature with stunning rock formations and scenic lake views.

image.alt: Lake Placid, Whiteface Mountain 2-Day Tour from New York

item.title: New Jersey New Year's Eve Buffet Dinner Cruise
item.description:
Embark on the ultimate New Year’s Eve celebration! Get ready for unparalleled festivities with dining, dancing, and magnificent skyline views lit up by a dazzling fireworks display over the Hudson River!
Enjoy a delicious, chef-prepared buffet, top shelf open bar, DJ entertainment and gorgeous views of New Jersey & New York’s spectacular skyline while you ring in the new year. A breathtaking New Year’s Eve celebration awaits on the water!
Silver Package Included- ticket plus top shelf bar

image.alt: New Jersey New Year's Eve Buffet Dinner Cruise

item.title: 4-Day Tennessee Great Smoky Mountain Tour from New York
item.description: Visit three of the major national parks in the eastern United States from New York in one seamless trip. In Tennessee, snap stunning photos at Great Smoky Mountains National Park and enjoy some proper Southern food. You’ll get in-depth tours of the parks with admission fees included so you can maximize your time at each location.

image.alt: 4-Day Tennessee Great Smoky Mountain Tour from New York

item.title: New Jersey Signature Bottomless Mimosa Brunch Cruise
item.description: No matter the occasion, a New Jersey Signature Bottomless Mimosa Brunch Cruise is sure to create an unforgettable afternoon. Experience a brunch cruise on the East and Hudson Rivers. Dine the day away with friends and family and soak in New Jersey and New York's skyline views along the Hudson and East Rivers. Enjoy spectacular views of the city skyline and local landmarks, including the Empire State Building, the Brooklyn Bridge, and the Statue of Liberty.

image.alt: New Jersey Signature Bottomless Mimosa Brunch Cruise

item.title: Private Fun FUV New York City & Time Sq. Tour
item.description: This is one of kind tour on OUR ECO-friendly all electric, highway legal, open air FUV Vehicles enjoy your surrounding NJ/NYC ADVENTURES . Enjoy NJ from the GWB to STATUE OF LIBERTY. DISCOVER NYC FROM DOWNTOWN TO UPTOWN PASS THROUGH CENTRAL PARK , AROUND COLUMBUS CIRCLE , DOWN TO LITTLE ITALY TO ENJOY SOME CULINARY DELIGHTS. THE BEST EXPERIENCE ENJOY THE TWO SIDES OF THE HUDSON AND SEE THINGS LIKE NEVER BEFORE...

image.alt: Private Fun FUV New York City & Time Sq. Tour

item.title: New Jersey Mother's Day Signature Dinner Cruise
item.description: Create family memories that will be treasured forever with an amazing New Jersey Mother’s Day Cruise on the Hudson and East Rivers. While onboard, treat the mom in your life to a special day with our Signature holiday buffet, classic cocktails, and New Jersey & New York City's most incredible views. Celebrate with dining and dancing from our climate-controlled interior, or soak in the picturesque backdrop from our outdoor decks.

image.alt: New Jersey Mother's Day Signature Dinner Cruise
